title: Hand Sanatiser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -  Provide a player with hand sanatiser each night, removing all negative effects from them and making their visit Astral for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -  You may use your own sanatiser once. Doing so will heal you and also sanatise your neighbours if still alive.

desc:
Post 2819
*Alternatively, just wash your hands every so often.*
